def read(mode=2):
    # 0: String
    # 1: List of strings
    # 2: List of integers
    inputs = input().strip()
    if mode == 0: return inputs
    if mode == 1: return inputs.split()
    if mode == 2: return list(map(int, inputs.split()))

def write(s="\n"):

    if isinstance(s, list): s = " ".join(map(str, s))
    s = str(s)
    print(s, end="")
